AutoActor.OnCommand: %function(self) self:rotationz(90); self:zoomx(1.2); self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:SetUpdateRate(0.1) end

Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:hidden(1) oat_RPC:set('state', 'Editor') oat_RPC:set('selecting', false) oat_RPC:update() self:queuecommand('Update') end
Layer.UpdateCommand:
%function(self) local isInGameMode = false if SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('SongForeground') then isInGameMode = (SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('SongForeground'):GetNumChildren() > 0) -- thanks jaezmien end
oat_RPC:set('playtesting', isInGameMode) oat_RPC:update()
self:sleep(3) self:queuecommand('Update') end
